title: How do I change the input method when editing a message?
answer: [Create a message, and touch the text field to bring up the onscreen keyboard. The default input method is the iFlytek input method. Swipe down on the screen to open the status bar, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111059), and select an input method.]()
